info.title: TMI (Threat Modeling Improved) API
info.description: Executable API workflows for Threat Modeling Interface (TMI)

workflows.summary: OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Flow with PKCE
workflows.description: The API uses OAuth 2.0 authorization code flow with PKCE (RFC 7636). Requires: (1) /oauth2/authorize to get code, (2) /oauth2/token to exchange code+verifier for tokens.

login_hint.description: User identity hint for test provider (3-20 alphanumeric + hyphens)

client_callback.description: Client callback URL for OAuth redirect

steps.description: Initiate OAuth authorization code flow with PKCE
Handle OAuth callback with authorization code
Exchange authorization code for access and refresh tokens using PKCE
